00043 
00045 double s_curve(double t) {
00046     return t * t * t * (t * ( 6 * t - 15 ) + 10 );
00047 }
00048 
00050 template<int d> unsigned char hashReduceChar(int index[d])
00051 {
00052     uint32_t seed=0;
00053     // blend with seed (constants from Numerical Recipes, attrib. from Knuth)
00054     for(int k=0;k<d;k++){
00055         static const uint32_t M = 1664525, C = 1013904223;
00056         seed=seed*M+index[k]+C;
00057     }
00058     // tempering (from Matsumoto)
00059     seed ^= (seed >> 11);
00060     seed ^= (seed << 7) & 0x9d2c5680UL;
00061     seed ^= (seed << 15) & 0xefc60000UL;
00062     seed ^= (seed >> 18);
00063     // compute one byte by mixing third and first bytes
00064     return (((seed&0xff0000) >> 4)+(seed&0xff))&0xff;
00065 }
00066 
00068 template<int d> uint32_t hashReduce(uint32_t index[d])
00069 {
00070     union {
00071         uint32_t i;
00072         unsigned char c[4];
00073     } u1, u2;
00074     // blend with seed (constants from Numerical Recipes, attrib. from Knuth)
00075     u2.i=0;
00076     for(int k=0;k<d;k++){
00077         static const uint32_t M = 1664525, C = 1013904223;
00078         u2.i=u2.i*M+index[k]+C;
00079     }
00080     // tempering (from Matsumoto)
00081     u1.i ^= (u1.i >> 11);
00082     u1.i ^= (u1.i << 7) & 0x9d2c5680U;
00083     u1.i ^= (u1.i << 15) & 0xefc60000U;
00084     u1.i ^= (u1.i >> 18);
00085     // permute bytes (shares perlin noise permutation table)
00086     u2.c[3] = p[u1.c[0]];
00087     u2.c[2] = p[u1.c[1]+u2.c[3]];
00088     u2.c[1] = p[u1.c[2]+u2.c[2]];
00089     u2.c[0] = p[u1.c[3]+u2.c[1]];
00090     
00091     return u2.i;
00092 }

00095 template<int d_in,int d_out,class T>
00096 void CellNoise(const T* in,T* out)
00097 {
00098     uint32_t index[d_in];
00099     int dim=0;
00100     for(int k=0;k<d_in;k++){
00101         index[k]=uint32_t(floor(in[k]));
00102         //std::cout<<"x "<<in[k]<<" index "<<index[k]<<std::endl;
00103     }
00104     while(1){
00105         //std::cerr<<"we got hash "<<hashReduce<d_in>(index)<<std::endl;;
00106         out[dim]=hashReduce<d_in>(index) * (1.0/0xffffffffu);
00107         //std::cerr<<" out is "<<out[dim]<<std::endl;
00108         if(++dim>=d_out) break;
00109         for(int k=0;k<d_in;k++) index[k]+=1000;
00110     }
00111 }
00112 
00114 template<int d,class T,bool periodic>
00115 T noiseHelper(const T* X,const int* period=0)
00116 {
00117     // find lattice index
00118     T weights[2][d]; // lower and upper weights
00119     int index[d];
00120     for(int k=0;k<d;k++){
00121         T f=floor(X[k]);
00122         index[k]=(int)f;
00123         if(periodic){
00124             index[k]%=period[k];
00125             if(index[k]<0) index[k]+=period[k];
00126         }
00127         weights[0][k]=X[k]-f;
00128         weights[1][k]=weights[0][k]-1; // dist to cell with index one above
00129     }
00130     // compute function values propagated from zero from each node
00131     int num=1<<d;
00132     T vals[num];
00133     for(int dummy=0;dummy<num;dummy++){
00134         int latticeIndex[d];
00135         int offset[d];
00136         for(int k=0;k<d;k++){
00137             offset[k]=((dummy&(1<<k))!=0);
00138             latticeIndex[k]=index[k]+offset[k];
00139         }
00140         // hash to get representative gradient vector
00141         int lookup=hashReduceChar<d>(latticeIndex);
00142         T val=0;
00143         for(int k=0;k<d;k++){
00144             double grad=NOISE_TABLES<d>::g[lookup][k];
00145             double weight=weights[offset[k]][k];
00146             val+=grad*weight;
00147         }
00148         vals[dummy]=val;
00149     }
00150     // compute linear interpolation coefficients
00151     T alphas[d];
00152     for(int k=0;k<d;k++) alphas[k]=s_curve(weights[0][k]);
00153     // perform multilinear interpolation (i.e. linear, bilinear, trilinear, quadralinear)
00154     for(int newd=d-1;newd>=0;newd--){
00155         int newnum=1<<newd;
00156         for(int dummy=0;dummy<newnum;dummy++){
00157             int index=dummy*(1<<(d-newd));
00158             int k=(d-newd-1);
00159             int otherIndex=index+(1<<k);
00160             //T alpha=s_curve(weights[0][k]);
00161             T alpha=alphas[k];
00162             vals[index]=(1-alpha)*vals[index]+alpha*vals[otherIndex];
00163         }
00164     }
00165     // return reduced version
00166     return vals[0];
00167 }

00170 template<int d_in,int d_out,class T> void Noise(const T* in,T* out)
00171 {
00172     T P[d_in];
00173     for(int i=0;i<d_in;i++) P[i]=in[i];
00174 
00175     int i=0;
00176     while(1){
00177         out[i]=noiseHelper<d_in,T,false>(P);
00178         if(++i>=d_out) break;
00179         for(int k=0;k<d_out;k++) P[k]+=(T)1000;
00180     }
00181 }
00182 
00184 template<int d_in,int d_out,class T> void PNoise(const T* in,const int* period,T* out)
00185 {
00186     T P[d_in];
00187     for(int i=0;i<d_in;i++) P[i]=in[i];
00188 
00189     int i=0;
00190     while(1){
00191         out[i]=noiseHelper<d_in,T,true>(P,period);
00192         if(++i>=d_out) break;
00193         for(int k=0;k<d_out;k++) P[k]+=(T)1000;
00194     }
00195 }
00196 
00199 template<int d_in,int d_out,bool turbulence,class T>
00200 void FBM(const T* in,T* out,
00201     int octaves,T lacunarity,T gain)
00202 {
00203     T P[d_in];
00204     for(int i=0;i<d_in;i++) P[i]=in[i];
00205 
00206     T scale=1;
00207     for(int k=0;k<d_out;k++) out[k]=0;
00208     int octave=0;
00209     while(1){
00210         T localResult[d_out];
00211         Noise<d_in,d_out>(P,localResult);
00212         if(turbulence)
00213             for(int k=0;k<d_out;k++) out[k]+=fabs(localResult[k])*scale;
00214         else
00215             for(int k=0;k<d_out;k++) out[k]+=localResult[k]*scale;
00216         if(++octave>=octaves)break;
00217         scale*=gain;
00218         for(int k=0;k<d_in;k++){
00219             P[k]*=lacunarity;
00220             P[k]+=(T)1234;
00221         }
00222     }
00223 }

00233 template void Noise<3,3,double>(const double*,double*);
00234 template void Noise<4,3,double>(const double*,double*);

00238 template void FBM<3,3,true,double>(const double*,double*,int,double,double);

00245 int main(int argc,char* argv[])
00246 {
00247     typedef double T;
00248     T sum=0;
00249     for(int i=0;i<10000000;i++){
00250         T foo[3]={.3,.3,.3};
00251         //for(int k=0;k<3;k++) foo[k]=(double)rand()/double(RAND_MAX)*100.;
